flawed_nl_solution:
Nurse Missy has 12*(0.3333333333333333)=<<12*(0.3333333333333333)=4>>4 special needs patients.
She has 12-4=<<12-4=4>>4 standard care patients.
Special needs patients take {percent_longer*100}% longer to serve, which means serving takes (1+0.2)*5=6 minutes per patient.
To serve dinner to all of her standard care patients, it will take 5*4=<<5*4=20>>20 minutes.
To serve dinner to all of her special needs patients, it will take 6*4=<<6*4=24>>24 minutes.
In total, it will take 20+24=<<20+24=44>>44 minutes to serve dinner to all of her patients.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 8.0, not 4.0. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
